paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to conduct change point analysis of interval-valued time series employing a regression trees approach. In order to deal with such time series we propose to employ a suitable distance measure that takes into account the underlying structure of interval data. Simulation results pertaining to the behavior of the proposed approach as well as an empirical application on a daily sample of air pollutant are provided, that illustrate the practical usefulness of the proposed method. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Regime change analysis of interval-valued time series with an application to PM10
